channel.title: Discord Blog

item.title: How to Create and Use Discord Emojis: A Beginner’s Guide to Creative Conversation
item.description: Emojis on Discord are special — you can make a little picture out of almost any symbol, in-joke, or bizarre late-night inspiration. Check out this blog post answering all the most frequently asked questions about them.

item.title: Talk Emoji To Me: The Science Behind Why We Love These Tiny Pictures

item.title: Discord x Crunchyroll: Get Premium Access, Connect Your Accounts, and Dive Into Anime

item.title: Attention Discord Developers: The App Directory is Here!

item.title: How Discord Supercharges Network Disks for Extreme Low Latency
item.description: It's no secret that Discord's your place to talk; 4 billion messages sent a day have us convinced. But text only accounts for a chunk of the features that Discord supports — learn how Discord optimizes its platform to respond to the high frequency of queries for all types of content and data as quickly as possible.

item.title: Using Machine Learning to Build a Delightful Notification Experience
item.description: A lot of companies struggle to use machine learning to improve their notification experience. Today, we’re talking with Discord’s ML team to share what they’ve found to work successfully and the problems they’ve encountered in the process.

item.title: How We’re Improving the Discord Experience for Everyone
